flavor_text_entries.flavor_text: Emitting ultrasonic cries, itnfloats on winds to travel greatndistances.
Its cries echo inside its hollownbody to emerge as beautiful notesnfor startling and repelling foes.
CHIMECHO makes its cries echoninside its hollow body. When thisnPOKéMON becomes enraged, its criesfresult in ultrasonic waves that haventhe power to knock foes flying.
In high winds, CHIMECHO cries as itnhangs from a tree branch or the eavesnof a building using a suction cup on itsfhead.nThis POKéMON plucks berries with itsnlong tail and eats them.
They fly about very actively when the hotnseason arrives. They communicate amongnthemselves using seven different andndistinguishing cries.
It travels by riding on winds. It cleverlynuses its long tail to pluck nuts andnberries, which it loves to eat.
It travels by riding on winds. It cleverlynuses its long tail to pluck nuts andnberries, which it loves to eat.
To knock foes flying, it makes thenair shudder with its cries. Itnconverses using seven cries.
It uses the sucker on its head tonhang from a tree or from eaves. Itncan produce seven different tones.
It uses the sucker on its head tonhang from a tree or from eaves. Itncan produce seven different tones.
Ses cris se répercutent dans sonncorps creux avant d’exploser ennnotes mélodieuses et saisissantes.
Its cries echo inside its hollownbody to emerge as beautiful notesnfor startling and repelling foes.
Ses cris se répercutent dans sonncorps creux avant d’exploser ennnotes mélodieuses et saisissantes.
Its cries echo inside its hollownbody to emerge as beautiful notesnfor startling and repelling foes.
Its cries echo inside its hollownbody to emerge as beautiful notesnfor startling and repelling foes.
Its cries echo inside its hollownbody to emerge as beautiful notesnfor startling and repelling foes.
あたまの　きゅうばんで　きの　えだやnいえの　のきしたに　ぶらさがる。n７しゅるい　ねいろを　つかいわける。
머리의 빨판으로 나뭇가지나n집의 처마 밑에 매달린다.n7종류의 음색을 나누어 쓴다.
Il se suspend sous une branche ou un auvent avecnla ventouse de sa tête. Son langage comporte septncris.
Mit seinem Saugnapf hängt es sich an Äste oder unternVordächer. Es kennt sieben verschiedene Schreie.
Se cuelga de ramas y aleros con la ventosa de suncabeza. Tiene siete tipos de gritos diferentes.
Emette sette tipi di versi penzolando da ramino cornicioni, a cui si attacca con la ventosa che hansul capo.
It uses the sucker on its head to hang from a treenor from eaves. It can produce seven different tones.
頭の　吸盤で　木の　枝やn家の　軒下に　ぶら下がる。n７種類　音色を　使い分ける。
ちょうおんぱの　なきごえを　もつ。nふわふわと　うかび　かぜに　のってnながい　きょりを　たびする。
초음파 울음소리를 가지고 있다.n둥둥 떠서 바람을 타고n긴 거리를 여행한다.
Il émet des cris à ultrasons et chevauche le vent pournparcourir de grandes distances.
Es setzt Ultraschallwellen frei, während es sichnvom Wind über große Distanzen tragen lässt.
Emite ondas ultrasónicas que le permiten flotar en elnviento para viajar grandes distancias.
Emette versi ultrasonici. Percorre grandi distanzenfacendosi trascinare dai venti.
Emitting ultrasonic cries, it floats on winds to travelngreat distances.
超音波の　鳴き声を　持つ。nふわふわと　浮かび　風に　乗ってn長い　距離を　旅する。
こえを　からだの　くうどうに　はんきょうさせる。nおこった　ときの　なきごえは　てきを　ふきとばすnいりょくを　もった　ちょうおんぱに　なるぞ。
목소리를 몸의 빈 곳에 메아리치게 한다.n화가 났을 때의 울음소리는 적을 날려버릴n위력을 지닌 초음파가 된다.
Éoko fait résonner son cri dans son corps creux.nLorsque ce Pokémon est en colère, les échos denson cri génèrent des ultrasons capables d’envoyernvoler des ennemis.
Palimpalims Schreie hallen durch seinen hohlen Körper.nWenn dieses Pokémon wütend wird, erzeugen seine SchreienUltraschallwellen, die seine Feinde buchstäblich wegfegennkönnen.
Chimecho hace que sus gritos resuenen con eco en suninterior. Cuando se enfada, los chillidos se convierten ennondas ultrasónicas capaces de derribar a los enemigosnvoladores.
Chimecho fa riecheggiare il suo verso dentro al corpo vuoto.nQuando s’infuria emette onde a ultrasuoni in grado dinabbattere i nemici in volo.
Chimecho makes its cries echo inside its hollow body.nWhen this Pokémon becomes enraged, its cries result innultrasonic waves that have the power to knock foes flying.
声を　体の　空洞に　反響させる。n怒った　ときの　鳴き声は　敵を　吹き飛ばすn威力を　持った　超音波に　なるぞ。
かぜが　つよくなると　きの　えだや　のきしたにnあたまの　きゅうばんで　ぶらさがり　なきだす。nながい　シッポで　きのみを　つまんで　たべる。
바람이 강해지면 나뭇가지나 처마 끝에n머리의 흡반으로 매달려 울기 시작한다.n긴 꼬리로 나무열매를 집어서 먹는다.
Lorsqu’il y a beaucoup de vent, Éoko pousse des cris,naccroché à une branche ou à un auvent par une ventousenplacée sur sa tête. Ce Pokémon attrape des Baies avecnsa longue queue pour les manger.

Bei starkem Wind hängt sich Palimpalim an einen Ast oder anndie Dachrinne eines Gebäudes, wobei es eine Saugkappe aufnseinem Kopf benutzt. Das Pokémon pflückt mit seinem langennSchweif Beeren und verspeist sie.

Cuando hay viento fuerte, Chimecho chilla colgado de la ramande un árbol o de los aleros de un edificio por la ventosa quentiene en la cabeza. Este Pokémon usa la larga cola que tienenpara agarrar bayas y comérselas.

Quando soffia il vento forte, Chimecho emette il suo versonpenzolando dai rami degli alberi o dai cornicioni, a cuinsi attacca con la ventosa che ha sul capo. Con la suanlunga coda scova le bacche dal terreno e se ne ciba.
In high winds, Chimecho cries as it hangs from a tree branch ornthe eaves of a building using a suction cup on its head. ThisnPokémon plucks berries with its long tail and eats them.
風が　強くなると　木の　枝や　軒下にn頭の　吸盤で　ぶら下がり　鳴き出す。n長い　シッポで　きのみを　つまんで　食べる。
